https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/cQs4ZCllDscbSF8meQFGGRd8rOY.jpg American Weapon is the story of six beautiful travelers who head to the mountains for a getaway weekend, only to be terrorized by a homicidal war veteran, who has been programmed to kill without remorse. American Weapon
